00018         bool guid::parse(const char* s)
00019         {
00020                 if (!s)
00021                         return false;
00022 
00023                 size_t size = strlen(s);
00024 
00025                 if(size != 38 && size != 36)
00026                         return false;
00027 
00028                 if (size == 38 && ( s[0] != '{' || s[37] != '}' ) )
00029                         return false;
00030 
00031                 size_t start = size == 38 ? 1 : 0;
00032 
00033                 int _data[8];
00034 
00035                 if(sscanf(&s[start], "%08lX-%04hX-%04hX-%02X%02X-%02X%02X%02X%02X%02X%02X",
00036                                 &data1, &data2, &data3,
00037                                 &_data[0], &_data[1], &_data[2], &_data[3],
00038                                 &_data[4], &_data[5], &_data[6], &_data[7]) != 11)
00039                         return false;
00040 
00041                 for(int i = 0; i != 8; ++i)
00042                         data4[i] = (unsigned char)_data[i];
00043                 return true;
00044         }
00045

00048         void guid::to_string(char* buf) const
00049         {
00050                 sprintf( buf, "%08lX-%04hX-%04hX-%02X%02X-%02X%02X%02X%02X%02X%02X",
00051                         data1, data2, data3,
00052                         data4[0], data4[1], data4[2], data4[3],
00053                         data4[4], data4[5], data4[6], data4[7] );
00054         }

00058         std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const guid& g)
00059         {
00060                 char buff[37];
00061                 g.to_string(buff);
00062                 os << buff;
00063                 return os;
00064         }

00068         std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& is, guid& g)
00069         {
00070                 char buff[39];
00071                 is.get(buff, 37, '\n');
00072                 if(buff[0] == '{')
00073                         is.get(&buff[36], 3, '\n');
00074 
00075                 if(!is) return is;
00076                 if(!g.parse(buff))
00077                         is.setstate(std::ios_base::failbit);
00078 
00079                 return is;
00080         }
